name: GetPlayerName
notes:
A player's name can be up to 24 characters long (as of 0.3d R2) by using SetPlayerName.
This is defined in a_samp.inc as MAX_PLAYER_NAME.
However, the client can only join with a nickname between 3 and 20 characters, otherwise the connection will be rejected and the player has to quit to choose a valid name.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to get the name of.

params_body.name: name[]
params_body.description: An array into which to store the name, passed by reference.

params_body.name: len
params_body.description: The length of the string that should be stored. Recommended to be MAX_PLAYER_NAME + 1. The + 1 is necessary to account for the null terminator.

return_values: The player's name is stored in the specified array.
